name: AmeriCorps State Commissions Support Grant
objective: To develop a State plan, to assist States in the application process, and to provide oversight of funded AmeriCorps programs within each State. The funds enable States to form a 15 to 25 member, independent, bipartisan commission appointed by a governor to implement service programs in their State.
top_agency_name: Corporation for National and Community Service
sub_agency_name: Corporation for National and Community Service
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: National and Community Service Act of 1990, as amended; Edward M. Kennedy Serve America Act.. Pub. L. 111, 13.

rules_regulations: Application Instructions. For detailed information contact the Headquarters Office.
